name: LOMAC LSM
short_description: LOMAC LSM is a Linux Security Module (LSM) based on the original LOMAC http://opensource.nailabs.com/lomac .  LOMAC implements a simple form of Mandatory Access Control mechanism based on Bibas Low Water-Mark Access Control model.
